name: Flokk
description:
Goal:

Aim of the game is to herd the sheep into the end goal pen. To do this we use whistles that can control the dog. The challenge is that the dog moves randomly through the level and cannot be controlled.

How to play:

WASD - Moves shepherd

Numkey 1 - Whistles dog left (In development)

Numkey 2 - Whistles dog right (In development)

Numkey 3 - Makes the dog run twice as fast

Numkey 4 - Pauses the dogs moves
